org.simplity.service

Interface ResponseWriter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JSONStringer, JSONWriter

    public interface ResponseWriter
    Though we are using JSON as of now, let us use an interface so that we are future-proof
    Author:
    simplity.org

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init()
        initialize. Typically start an outer object that contains everything.

      • end

        void end()
  throws ResponseWriterException
        done with writing. this MUST be called before getting the response. Else response may not be well-formed etc..
        Throws:
        ResponseWriterException - if this is not in end() able
